title: Is it possible to listen to around 1,500 songs a day? - Quora

response.answer_text: I going assume to take time out for eating, pooping, and sleeping…for a total of 8 hours. That give 16 hours. … 960 minutes. 960 minutes / 1500 songs would be 38.4 seconds per song. Kinda short. So let’s use the entire 24 hours that would give 57.6 seconds per song. Still short, even for pop songs. No you can not listen to 1,500 songs per day. Pop songs average about 3–1/2 minutes. In 24 hours you COULD listen to 1141 songs in a day if they were the average length of 3–1/2 minutes.
i don,t think so if you calculate the time a song takes and the hours of a day you’ll get your answer
